question: Is there anything called "LOVE" between two unmarried individuals (one male and other female).
answer:
QUESTION
I love a girl.I dont want to touch her nor talk to her.I just want to see her and want her to be happy.Is this love ? I dont have any bad intension about her.I dont see her with a bad eye.Is this type of love allowed in islam. But sometimes i feel that this is a sin.I am very tensed. Plz guide me.I wish to marry her but my conditions are not supporting marriage because i am still studying at an age of 20 years.Plz guide mai.I shall be thankful for ur kindness.Thankyou khudahafi
ANSWER


Share:
The concept of pre-marital love is baseless in Shari?ah. This is the ideology of the west that the prospective spouses should have relationship with each other so that they may come to know each other.

According to the Shari?ah, it is prohibited for a man to have any contact with any strange-woman. We suggest you communicate your intentions to your parents and take their guidance on the issue.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
